page.title: 10HOME LIFE IN THURLASTON
page.content: The area of Thurlaston is a mixture of commuter,retired and farming households Our survey found that most life styles were similar apart from the farmers. Many village people rise at 8:30am on a Sunday,although others rise between 6:30 and 10:00am.The average time for weekday rising was 7:00 and 8:00 am. The few who got up at 6:00am were farmers. The way children get to school is generally by car.Others by bus,bicycle,or on foot. Cats are the most popular pets, followed by dogs,fish,rabbits,guinea pigs and birds. Farm animals include bullocks,ducks and hens.
